segments.text: I see the girl reaching out for a cookie, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, just waiting for her brother to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she doesn’t realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really struggling to keep his balance on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the girl; she might get hurt if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor so slippery, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get the cookies and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a tense moment, but also kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
